backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, inventory, sales, and user profiles with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend error‑handling improvement to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and type definitions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme styles for global UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing view switching and providing React Query context with a navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal for adjusting inventory stock with validation, backend mutation, and normalized error messages.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard fetching and displaying sales summary with formatted metrics and improved actor‑retry error handling.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal for editing inventory items, with form validation, duplicate checks, and mutation to update items.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Modal for creating new inventory items, including validation, duplicate checks, and automatic final stock calculation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory management page showing inventory list, loading/error states, and controls for adding, editing, and adjusting stock.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Top navigation bar with menu items, icons, and a dropdown for reports, allowing view switching.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal for adding products with validation, category/size selection, price input, and image upload handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a products list with loading, error, and empty states, and provides UI for adding products and navigating back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Modal that prompts the user to enter a quantity for a selected product and shows pricing details before confirming.
Reusable error display component that detects auth-related errors and provides retry functionality.
Handles cart and payment flow for recording sales, including product selection, quantity input, and submitting transactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s backend role with safe fallbacks and avoids UI gating based on role retrieval failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Retrieves dashboard summary data from the backend using the initialized actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login and logout handling, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, add, update, and adjust inventory items via the actor API, with cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Defines hooks for fetching products and adding a new product through the actor API with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Creates a mutation hook to record sales and refresh dashboard summary data after submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Utilities for normalizing inventory item names and checking for duplicates with optional ID exclusion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash and query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending color tokens, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the app rebuild.
